cause.description:
The aim is to stop and end all the fighting and killing in Darfur. Also to try and help as many refugee who have been a victim to the continous fighting and killings.
1. We dont wont what happenend 13 years in Rwanda to happen again in Darfur.
cause.mission: Is to stop all the fighting in killings going on in Darfur
cause.name: Stop the Genocide in Darfur
